      • GetAllZooCloserThen

        public java.util.List<ZooEntity> GetAllZooCloserThen(int zooId,
                                                     int distance)
        Method Finds neighboring Zoo objects. Finds all Zoo objects closer then 'distance' to Zoo object with id 'zooId'.
        Parameters:
        zooId - center zoo id
        distance - is maximum distance from center Zoo object.
        Returns:
        List of neighboring Zoo objects.

      • Intersection

        public boolean Intersection(int zooFirstId,
                            int zooSecondId)
        Method check if two Zoo objects is in intersection. Check if Zoo object with id 'zooFirstId' is in intersection with Zoo object with id 'zooSecondId'.
        Parameters:
        zooFirstId - first Zoo object id.
        zooSecondId - second Zoo object id.
        Returns:
        true if objects is in intersection.

      • ZooObjectContainsZooObject

        public boolean ZooObjectContainsZooObject(int zooFirstId,
                                          int zooSecondId)
        Method check if first Zoo object contains second Zoo object. Check if Zoo object with id 'zooFirstId' contains Zoo object with id 'zooSecondId'.
        Parameters:
        zooFirstId - first Zoo object id.
        zooSecondId - second Zoo object id.
        Returns:
        true if first zoo Object contains second one, otherwise false.
